Write-Up Text: The Auspol chit chats have been heating up as political enthusiasts went on a frenzy over the recent budget drafts announced by different people. Some argue that federal budget spending is the root of the unprecedented rise in prices while others are perplexed why the media is quick to dissect ALP's government while conveniently disregarding LNP's. Tensions seep further in as people commented on the lack of focus on mental health and working poor in Labor's budget. However things seem to be looking up for some with WA Premier's surplus announcement and 1.1M Queensland residents' 10% power price drop.
